entry.title: JSB Bluntman & Chronic Horizontal Rolling Tray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Jay and Silent Bob
Type: Rolling Tray
Price: 3.40 - 4.60 (2 variants)

Jay & Silent Bob strike back with an all-new line of rolling trays. These trays are mad notes! Available in small and medium, they’re top quality and a must-have for any JSB fan. An everyday essential item, rolling trays are one of the most useful accessories for cannabis users everywhere. Beyond rolling, you can use your tray to reduce clutter and conveniently store you kit, or to easily take your kit with you on the go. Whether it’s convenience or portability you’re after, Jay & Silent Bob rolling Trays will deliver the good.

  • Made from Thick Metal Alloy
  • Extremely Smooth Glossy Surface
  • High Edges with Rounded Corners
  • Available in Small and Medium
  • 7 Exclusive Designs

The JSB “15 Bucks” rolling tray features Jay & Bob against a green background with the iconic quote overhead. It offers a smooth, glossy surface to roll on, complete with high edges and rounded corners.

entry.title: GNR Was Here Tray
entry.summary:
Vendor: GUNS N ROSES
Type: Rolling Tray
Price: 3.40 - 4.60 (2 variants)

GNR Rolling Trays

  • Made from aluminum
  • Compact design
  • Non-stick rolling surface
  • Rounded edges
  • High-quality graphic
  • Available in Small and Medium

 

Our officially licensed Guns N’ Roses line of smoking accessories is back with an all-new set of rolling trays! As with the other pieces in this seriously cool collection, the new trays feature iconic artwork familiar to superfans or anyone who loves rock music in general. Be sure to keep good times rolling with GNR Rolling Trays!

These trays have been cut from quality aluminum and were made with durability in mind. They come in two sizes, measuring 18 x 14 cm / 7 x 5.5 inches (small) and 27 x 16 cm / 10.6 x 6.2 inches (medium). Their size and durability make them excellent for indoor or outdoor use, while at home or on the go. The trays feature a non-stick rolling surface and rounded edges, making your rolling mix muxheasier to handle.

Small – 180x140x15 mm

Medium – 270x160x22 mm

GNR Was Here
The ghastly GNR Was Here features undead caricatures of all the Guns N’ Roses band members with a ghoulishly attractive white and green ghost motif.

entry.title: Zig-Zag-Metal Rolling Tray
entry.summary:
Vendor: zig-zag
Type: Rolling Tray
Price: 2.99 - 5.49 (8 variants)

Having been around for more than 150 years, the Zig-Zag brand is a true originator in the world of rolling and smoking accessories. They now offer an extended line of accessories to include these high-quality, premium rolling trays! An everyday essential item, rolling trays are one of the most useful accessories for cannabis users everywhere, and are a must-have item for every kit. Beyond rolling, you can use your tray to reduce clutter and conveniently store you kit, or to easily take your kit with you on the go. Whether it’s convenience or portability you’re after, Zig-Zag Rolling Trays will deliver. 

  • Made from Thick Tin 
  • Extremely Smooth Glossy Surface 
  • High Edges with Rounded Corners 
  • Available in Small and Medium 

 

Zig-Zag-Metal Rolling Tray-Medium-Black (SKUs: H5339BK) 

Zig-Zag rolling trays feature the Zig-Zag logo in black and offer a smooth, glossy 6" x 11.5" surface to roll on, complete with high edges and rounded corners. 


Zig-Zag-Metal Rolling Tray-Small-Black (SKU: H5345BK) 

Zig-Zag rolling trays feature the Zig-Zag logo in black and offer a smooth, glossy 5.5" x 7" surface to roll on, complete with high edges and rounded corners. 
 

Zig-Zag-Metal Rolling Tray-Medium-Orange (SKU: H5339O) 

Zig-Zag rolling trays feature the Zig-Zag logo in orange and offer a smooth, glossy 6" x 11.5" surface to roll on, complete with high edges and rounded corners. 

Zig-Zag-Metal Rolling Tray-Small-Orange (SKU: H5345O) 

Zig-Zag rolling trays feature the Zig-Zag logo in orange and offer a smooth, glossy 5.5" x 7" surface to roll on, complete with high edges and rounded corners. 

Zig-Zag-Original Metal Rolling Tray-Medium (SKU: H5341) 

Zig-Zag rolling trays feature the original Zig-Zag logo and offer a smooth, glossy 6" x 11.5" surface to roll on, complete with high edges and rounded corners. 

Zig-Zag-Original Metal Rolling Tray-Small (SKU: H5347) 

Zig-Zag rolling trays feature the original Zig-Zag logo and offer a smooth, glossy 5.5" x 7" orange surface to roll on, complete with high edges and rounded corners. 

Zig-Zag-Organic Metal Rolling Tray-Medium (SKU: H5343) 

Zig-Zag rolling trays feature the Zig-Zag Organic logo and offer a smooth, glossy 6" x 11.5" orange surface to roll on, complete with high edges and rounded corners. 

Zig-Zag-Organic Metal Rolling Tray-Small (SKU: H5349) 

Zig-Zag rolling trays offer a smooth, glossy 5.5" x 7" orange surface to roll on, complete with high edges and rounded corners.

entry.title: San Rafael-Bus Metal Tray-Blue-Medium
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aurora
Type: Rolling Tray
Price: 7.49

Feeling blue? San Rafael is here to help. This comprehensive collection includes everything from water pipes, to trays and grinders. With their classic blue shade at the forefront of the design, these minimalistic accessories will be at the top of everyone’s list.

Keep your session essentials all in one place with the help of this metal rolling tray. Made from high quality aluminum, this sturdy tray is made to last. Measuring 6.25 x 10.5”/15.88 x 26.67cm, this tray can be taken on the go but is an ideal size for at home smoking. The tray has a non-stick surface and rounded edges, this helps prevent your herb from getting stuck in the corners.

With it’s classic dark blue coloring and fun, bus imagery, this San Rafael tray is the perfect addition to your collection.

entry.summary:
Vendor: RGR Canada Inc.
Type: Rolling Tray
Price: 6.25

Small, Large & Extra Large

entry.title: Surrender Rolling Tray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Famous Brandz
Type: Rolling Tray
Price: 3.25 - 4.25 (2 variants)

Whether you’re a connoisseur, beginner or just looking for an affordable, unique tray to keep all your smoking accessories together in one place, this aluminum rolling tray from Famous Design will definitely do the trick.

Keep all your smoking gear within reach with this handy metal rolling tray. Made from quality aluminum it has been designed to be able to take a beating. The small size measures 5.5 x 7”/ 13.97 x 17.78 cm and the medium size is 6.25 x 10.5”/ 15.88 x 26.67 cm. This gives you the option of small and portable, or something a little bigger for extra smoking accessories. The tray has a non-stick rolling surface and is equipped with round edges, which prevents your herbs from getting stuck in the corners.

This delicious rolling tray named Surrender features an epic honey drip design on top of a black background. So, if you’re looking for a cool and functional rolling tray – you found it!
